item.title: Athena partitions silently failing
item.description: While setting up some partitioned data in S3 for Athena to query, I ran across an unusual error which I lost a lot of time tracking down so hopefully, this might help someone else. The data file contents were just simple JSON files, organised into a year/month/date heirachy in an S3 bucket: 1 2 3 4 5 invoice/year=2019/month=10/day=01/20191001-001.json invoice/year=2019/month=10/day=01/20191001-002.json invoice/year=2019/month=10/day=01/20191001-003.json invoice/year=2019/month=10/day=01/20191001-004.json invoice/year=2019/month=10/day=01/20191001-005.json My Glue data catalog was defined by Terraform:
